snippet: The Transportation Department said that a long-awaited package of rules aimed at improving the safety of oil transport by rail had been sent Wednesday night to the White House for review.
abstract: CSX train carrying crude oil derails and erupts into flames in downtown Lynchburg, Va, forcing scores of people to evacuate and causing spill in the James River; Transportation Dept says long-awaited package of rules aimed at improving the safety of oil transport by rail has been sent to the White House for review.

byline.original: By CLIFFORD KRAUSS and TRIP GABRIEL

lead_paragraph: The Transportation Department said that a long-awaited package of rules aimed at improving the safety of oil transport by rail had been sent Wednesday night to the White House for review.

headline.main: As New Shipping Rules Are Studied, Another Oil Train Derails
headline.print_headline: As New Shipping Rules Are Studied, Another Oil Train Derails
